Dangers of Unethical Email and Content Marketing

Updated: Oct 14, 2021

Email and Content Marketing
Students Name
Course
Instructor
Date

Unethical marketing practices entail breaking the rules that guide the promotion process. Spamming is unethical and can be considered illegal since it involves sending emails to people who have not asked for them. The above campaign is an example of spam emails sent to customers who are not interested in the advertisements. The sender's email address in the above campaign looks suspicious, and it contains many spam-like words. It is unethical for an organization to send bulk emails to customers if they have not subscribed to any notifications or services. The customer in the above campaign is not interested in getting any rewards from the program when purchasing products and services from Amazon Company. Spam emails are illegal since they violate anti-spam laws. Companies are not supposed to use customers’ emails to persuade them to purchase products and services without their consent.


Spam emails can ruin the reputation of Amazon Company in the business environment. A bad reputation contributes to financial losses since the customers can decide to boycott the company’s products and services (Lekhanya, 2014). The advertising agency can be blocked and blocked if the customers report instances of spam. Blacklisting means that the Company cannot send emails using the affected emails and IP addresses. The company can lose internet accounts due to persistent spamming. Customers are less likely to purchase services and products advertised in spam emails, which reduces the company's sales and revenues in the business environment. Customers who have received spam emails can tell their friends not to buy the products and services of the company. The company should focus on efficient marketing practices to boost its customer base and competitive advantage.

Reference

Lekhanya, L. M. (2014). The impact of viral marketing on corporate brand reputation. The international business & economic research journal (Online)..
